Body:
I'm a linguistics student and working on narrow transcriptions. Most transcription come fairly easily to me, but I'm caught up on the vowel in the word "hard"

How should the vowel be transcribed with General American (from central New York state) accent? What I have so far (with V standing in for the vowel: [hVÉ¹d] (the vowel will presumably be rhoticisized)
Title: IPA Transcription help
